courses.name: Python Programming
objectives: Understand basic Python syntax and data types.
Explore advanced topics like object-oriented programming.

curriculum.name: Introduction to Python
curriculum.description: Overview of Python and its use cases.

curriculum.name: Data types and variables
curriculum.description: Understanding different data types and variable usage in Python.

curriculum.name: Control structures
curriculum.description: Learn about if statements, loops, and decision-making in Python.

curriculum.name: Functions and modules
curriculum.description: Creating and using functions, modular programming in Python.

curriculum.name: Object-oriented programming basics
curriculum.description: Introduction to classes, objects, and inheritance in Python.

courses.name: C++ Programming
outcomes: Understanding of memory allocation and deallocation.

curriculum.name: Introduction to C++
curriculum.description: Overview of C++ language and its application.

curriculum.name: Variables and data types
curriculum.description: Understanding different variables and data types in C++.

curriculum.name: Control flow and functions
curriculum.description: Decision-making, loops, and function usage in C++.

curriculum.name: Memory management
curriculum.description: Learn about pointers, dynamic memory allocation in C++.

curriculum.name: Object-oriented programming in C++
curriculum.description: Classes, objects, and inheritance in C++.

courses.name: Java Programming
objectives: Learn Java syntax and language features.
outcomes: Skills in multi-threading and exception handling.

curriculum.name: Introduction to Java
curriculum.description: Overview of Java language and its applications.

curriculum.name: Java syntax and language features
curriculum.description: Understanding syntax, data types, and language features in Java.

curriculum.name: Multi-threading and exception handling
curriculum.description: Learn to work with multiple threads and handle exceptions in Java.

curriculum.name: Java frameworks
curriculum.description: Introduction to popular Java frameworks for application development.

curriculum.name: Java application development
curriculum.description: Hands-on projects using Java for application development.

courses.name: PHP Web Development
courses.description: Introduction to PHP for web development.
objectives: Understand PHP syntax and basic web concepts.
Learn to build dynamic web pages and applications.
Explore databases and server-side scripting with PHP.
outcomes: Proficiency in PHP programming for web development.
Ability to create dynamic web pages.
Skills in database integration using PHP.

curriculum.name: Introduction to PHP
curriculum.description: Overview of PHP and its role in web development.

curriculum.name: PHP syntax and basic concepts
curriculum.description: Understanding PHP syntax, variables, and basic concepts.

curriculum.name: Dynamic web page development
curriculum.description: Creating dynamic content using PHP in web pages.

curriculum.name: Database integration with PHP
curriculum.description: Connecting PHP to databases, executing queries.

curriculum.name: Server-side scripting
curriculum.description: Practical applications of server-side scripting in PHP.
